aboutstr:
This bot was created by 3urobeat.
GitHub: https://github.com/HerrEurobeat/steam-comment-service-bot 
Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/id/3urobeat 
If you like my work, any donation would be appreciated! https://paypal.me/3urobeat
whatsnew: One account can now comment multiple times (repeatedComments in config)! Added !failed command to see all detailed comment errors. Revamped the console interface. For more way more changes visit the GitHub Repo!
